text: New York City has been known by many nicknames. ==Common nicknames== *The Big Apple: first used as a reference to the city's prominence in horse racing by John J. Fitz Gerald during the 1920s but made popular by a 1970s advertisement campaign *The Capital of the World (): by E. B. White and by New York Mayor Rudy Giuliani *The Center of the Universe: in reference to Times Square *The City of Neon and Chrome: stated in the 1996 Broadway musical Rent, written by Jonathan Larson *The Five Boroughs *New Amsterdam: the original name of the Dutch colony from 1624 until 1665 ==References== Category:New York City
title: Nicknames of New York City
